verses.verse: ( The Sovereignty of God) שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> šim·‘ū Hear אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> had·dā·ḇār the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> dib·ber speaks יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> ‘ă·lê·ḵem to you, בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> bêṯ O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel.

כֹּ֣ה׀ <WH3541> kōh This is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... דֶּ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> de·reḵ the ways הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> hag·gō·w·yim of the nations אַל־ <WH408> ’al- “ Do not תִּלְמָ֔דוּ <WH3925> til·mā·ḏū learn וּמֵאֹת֥וֹת <WH226> ū·mê·’ō·ṯō·wṯ by the signs הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> haš·šā·ma·yim in the heavens אַל־ <WH408> ’al- ..., תֵּחָ֑תּוּ <WH2865> tê·ḥāt·tū or be terrified כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- though יֵחַ֥תּוּ <WH2865> yê·ḥat·tū are terrified הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> hag·gō·w·yim the nations [themselves] מֵהֵֽמָּה׃ Prep-m│Pro-3mp ( mê·hêm·māh) by them.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- For חֻקּ֥וֹת <WH2708> ḥuq·qō·wṯ the customs הָֽעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> hā·‘am·mîm of the peoples הֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> he·ḇel are worthless; ה֑וּא <WH1931> hū ... כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- ... עֵץ֙ <WH6086> ‘êṣ a tree מִיַּ֣עַר <WH3293> mî·ya·‘ar from the forest; כְּרָת֔וֹ <WH3772> kə·rā·ṯōw they cut down מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śêh it is shaped יְדֵ֥י־ <WH3027> yə·ḏê- by the hands חָרָ֖שׁ <WH2796> ḥā·rāš of a craftsman. בַּֽמַּעֲצָֽד׃ <WH4621> bam·ma·‘ă·ṣāḏ with a chisel

בְּכֶ֥סֶף <WH3701> bə·ḵe·sep̄ with silver וּבְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> ū·ḇə·zā·hāḇ and gold יְיַפֵּ֑הוּ <WH3302> yə·yap·pê·hū They adorn it בְּמַסְמְר֧וֹת <WH4548> bə·mas·mə·rō·wṯ and nails, וּבְמַקָּב֛וֹת <WH4717> ū·ḇə·maq·qā·ḇō·wṯ with hammer יְחַזְּק֖וּם <WH2388> yə·ḥaz·zə·qūm and fasten it וְל֥וֹא <WH3808> wə·lō·w so that it will not יָפִֽיק׃ <WH6328> yā·p̄îq totter.

כְּתֹ֨מֶר <WH8560> kə·ṯō·mer Like scarecrows מִקְשָׁ֥ה <WH4750> miq·šāh in a cucumber patch, הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> hêm·māh their idols וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō cannot יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> yə·ḏab·bê·rū speak. נָשׂ֥וֹא <WH5375> nā·śō·w They must be carried יִנָּשׂ֖וּא <WH5375> yin·nā·śū ... כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî because לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō they cannot יִצְעָ֑דוּ <WH6805> yiṣ·‘ā·ḏū walk. אַל־ <WH408> ’al- Do not תִּֽירְא֤וּ <WH3372> tî·rə·’ū fear מֵהֶם֙ Prep-m│Pro-3mp ( mê·hem) them, כִּי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) for לֹ֣א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) they can do no יָרֵ֔עוּ 7489 V-Hifil-Imperf-3mp ( yā·rê·‘ū) harm, וְגַם־ 1571 Conj ( wə·ḡam-) and הֵיטֵ֖יב 3190 V-Hifil-InfAbs ( hê·ṭêḇ) do any good. ” אֵ֥ין 369 Adv ( ’ên) neither can they אוֹתָֽם׃ס 854 Prep│3mp ( ’ō·w·ṯām) ...

מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> mê·’ên There is none כָּמ֖וֹךָ <WH3644> kā·mō·w·ḵā like You, יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD. גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> gā·ḏō·wl are great, אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> ’at·tāh You וְגָד֥וֹל <WH1419> wə·ḡā·ḏō·wl is mighty שִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> šim·ḵā and Your name בִּגְבוּרָֽה׃ <WH1369> biḡ·ḇū·rāh in power.

מִ֣י <WH4310> mî Who לֹ֤א <WH3808> lō would not יִֽרָאֲךָ֙ <WH3372> yi·rā·’ă·ḵā fear You, מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ O King הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag·gō·w·yim of nations? כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî לְךָ֖ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) . יָאָ֑תָה 2969 V-Qal-Perf-3fs ( yā·’ā·ṯāh) This is Your due כִּ֣י 3588 Conj ( kî) For בְכָל־ 3605 Prep-b│N-msc ( ḇə·ḵāl-) among all חַכְמֵ֧י 2450 Adj-mpc ( ḥaḵ·mê) the wise [men] הַגּוֹיִ֛ם 1471 Art│N-mp ( hag·gō·w·yim) of the nations, וּבְכָל־ 3605 Conj-w, Prep-b│N-msc ( ū·ḇə·ḵāl) and in all מַלְכוּתָ֖ם 4438 N-fsc│3mp ( mal·ḵū·ṯām) their kingdoms, מֵאֵ֥ין 369 Prep-m│Adv ( mê·’ên) there is none כָּמֽוֹךָ׃ 3644 Prep│2ms ( kā·mō·w·ḵā) like You.

וּבְאַחַ֖ת <WH259> ū·ḇə·’a·ḥaṯ But they are altogether יִבְעֲר֣וּ <WH1197> yiḇ·‘ă·rū senseless וְיִכְסָ֑לוּ <WH3688> wə·yiḵ·sā·lū and foolish, מוּסַ֥ר <WH4148> mū·sar instructed הֲבָלִ֖ים <WH1892> hă·ḇā·lîm by worthless idols עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> ‘êṣ made of wood! הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> hū ...

כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> ke·sep̄ silver מְרֻקָּ֞ע <WH7554> mə·ruq·qā‘ Hammered מִתַּרְשִׁ֣ישׁ <WH8659> mit·tar·šîš from Tarshish, יוּבָ֗א <WH935> yū·ḇā is brought וְזָהָב֙ <WH2091> wə·zā·hāḇ and gold מֵֽאוּפָ֔ז <WH210> mê·’ū·p̄āz from Uphaz — מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śêh the work חָרָ֖שׁ <WH2796> ḥā·rāš of a craftsman וִידֵ֣י <WH3027> wî·ḏê from the hands צוֹרֵ֑ף <WH6884> ṣō·w·rêp̄ of a goldsmith. תְּכֵ֤לֶת <WH8504> tə·ḵê·leṯ are blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <WH713> wə·’ar·gā·mān and purple, לְבוּשָׁ֔ם <WH3830> lə·ḇū·šām Their clothes מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śêh fashioned חֲכָמִ֖ים <WH2450> ḥă·ḵā·mîm by skilled workers. כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> kul·lām all

וַֽיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah·weh But the LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God; אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> ’ĕ·meṯ is the true הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hū- He אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God חַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> ḥay·yîm is the living וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> ū·me·leḵ King. עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ‘ō·w·lām and eternal מִקִּצְפּוֹ֙ <WH7110> miq·qiṣ·pōw at His wrath, תִּרְעַ֣שׁ <WH7493> tir·‘aš quakes הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ The earth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- cannot יָכִ֥לוּ <WH3557> yā·ḵi·lū endure גוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> ḡō·w·yim and the nations זַעְמֽוֹ׃ס <WH2195> za‘·mōw His indignation.

כִּדְנָה֙ <WH1836> kiḏ·nāh Thus תֵּאמְר֣וּן <WH560> tê·mə·rūn you are to tell לְה֔וֹם Prep│3mp ( lə·hō·wm) them: אֱלָ֣הַיָּ֔א 426 N-mpd ( ’ĕ·lā·hay·yā) “ [These] gods, דִּֽי־ 1768 Pro-r ( dî-) who שְׁמַיָּ֥א 8065 N-mpd ( šə·may·yā) the heavens וְאַרְקָ֖א 778 Conj-w│N-fsd ( wə·’ar·qā) [nor] the earth, לָ֣א 3809 Adv ( lā) neither עֲבַ֑דוּ 5648 V-Qal-Perf-3mp ( ‘ă·ḇa·ḏū) have made יֵאבַ֧דוּ 7 V-Qal-Imperf. Jus-3mp ( yê·ḇa·ḏū) will perish מֵֽאַרְעָ֛א 772 Prep-m│N-fsd ( mê·’ar·‘ā) from this earth וּמִן־ 4481 Conj-w│Prep ( ū·min-) and from תְּח֥וֹת 8460 Prep ( tə·ḥō·wṯ) under שְׁמַיָּ֖א 8065 N-mpd ( šə·may·yā) heavens.” אֵֽלֶּה׃ס 429 Pro-3cp ( ’êl·leh) these

עֹשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> ‘ō·śêh [The LORD] made אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ’e·reṣ the earth בְּכֹח֔וֹ <WH3581> bə·ḵō·ḥōw by His power; מֵכִ֥ין <WH3559> mê·ḵîn He established תֵּבֵ֖ל <WH8398> tê·ḇêl the world בְּחָכְמָת֑וֹ <WH2451> bə·ḥā·ḵə·mā·ṯōw by His wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָת֖וֹ <WH8394> ū·ḇiṯ·ḇū·nā·ṯōw by His understanding. נָטָ֥ה <WH5186> nā·ṭāh and stretched out שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> šā·mā·yim the heavens

לְק֨וֹל <WH6963> lə·qō·wl When He thunders תִּתּ֜וֹ <WH5414> tit·tōw ..., הֲמ֥וֹן <WH1995> hă·mō·wn roar; מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> ma·yim the waters בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> baš·šā·ma·yim in the heavens וַיַּעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> way·ya·‘ă·leh to rise נְשִׂאִ֖ים <WH5387> nə·śi·’îm He causes the clouds מִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> miq·ṣêh from the ends אֶרֶץ <WH776> ʾɛ·rɛṣ of the earth. בְּרָקִ֤ים <WH1300> bə·rā·qîm the lightning לַמָּטָר֙ <WH4306> lam·mā·ṭār with the rain עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> ‘ā·śāh He generates וַיּ֥וֹצֵא <WH3318> way·yō·w·ṣê and brings forth ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> rū·aḥ the wind מֵאֹצְרֹתָֽיו׃ <WH214> mê·’ō·ṣə·rō·ṯāw from His storehouses.

נִבְעַ֤ר <WH1197> niḇ·‘ar is senseless כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- Every אָדָם֙ <WH120> ’ā·ḏām man מִדַּ֔עַת <WH1847> mid·da·‘aṯ and devoid of knowledge; הֹבִ֥ישׁ <WH3001> hō·ḇîš is put to shame כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- every צוֹרֵ֖ף <WH6884> ṣō·w·rêp̄ goldsmith מִפָּ֑סֶל <WH6459> mip·pā·sel by his idols. כִּ֛י <WH3588> kî For שֶׁ֥קֶר <WH8267> še·qer are a fraud, נִסְכּ֖וֹ <WH5262> nis·kōw his molten images וְלֹא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- and [there is] no ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> rū·aḥ breath בָּֽם׃ Prep│3mp ( bām) in them.

הֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> he·ḇel are worthless, הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> hêm·māh They מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śêh a work תַּעְתֻּעִ֑ים <WH8595> ta‘·tu·‘îm to be mocked. בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> bə·‘êṯ In the time פְּקֻדָּתָ֖ם <WH6486> pə·qud·dā·ṯām of their punishment יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6> yō·ḇê·ḏū they will perish.

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- is not כְאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> ḵə·’êl·leh like these, חֵ֣לֶק <WH2506> ḥê·leq The Portion יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ of Jacob כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- for יוֹצֵ֤ר <WH3335> yō·w·ṣêr is the Maker הַכֹּל֙ <WH3605> hak·kōl of all things, ה֔וּא <WH1931> hū He וְיִ֨שְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> wə·yiś·rā·’êl and Israel [is] שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> šê·ḇeṭ the tribe נַֽחֲלָת֑וֹ <WH5159> na·ḥă·lā·ṯōw of His inheritance — יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> ṣə·ḇā·’ō·wṯ of Hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ס <WH8034> šə·mōw is His name.

( The Coming Captivity of Judah) אִסְפִּ֥י <WH622> ’is·pî Gather up מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> mê·’e·reṣ from this land, כִּנְעָתֵ֑ךְ <WH3666> kin·‘ā·ṯêḵ your belongings יֹשַׁבְתִּי <WH3427> yō·šaḇ·tī you who live בַּמָּצֽוֹר׃ס <WH4692> bam·mā·ṣō·wr under siege.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- For כֹה֙ <WH3541> ḵōh this is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> hin·nî “ Behold, קוֹלֵ֛עַ <WH7049> qō·w·lê·a‘ I will sling out אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> yō·wō·šə·ḇê the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ of the land בַּפַּ֣עַם <WH6471> bap·pa·‘am time הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz·zōṯ at this וַהֲצֵר֥וֹתִי <WH6887> wa·hă·ṣê·rō·w·ṯî and bring distress לָהֶ֖ם Prep-l│Pro-3mp ( lā·hem) upon them לְמַ֥עַן 4616 Conj ( lə·ma·‘an) so that they יִמְצָֽאוּ׃ס 4672 V-Qal-Imperf-3mp ( yim·ṣā·’ū) may be captured. ”
